subMembers.name: activeStateEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether Stepper changes its appearance when in the active state (when an end user interacts with it).

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<dxStepperItem> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: focusStateEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component can be focused using keyboard navigation.

subMembers.name: hoverStateEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component changes its appearance when a user hovers over it.

subMembers.name: items
subMembers.description: An array of items (steps) displayed by the Stepper component.

subMembers.name: selectOnFocus
subMembers.description: Specifies if items are selected automatically when focused by keyboard.

subMembers.name: Interfaces
subMembers.description: This section describes interfaces that the {WidgetName} component uses.

subMembers.name: hint
subMembers.description: Specifies the hint text that appears when an item (step) is hovered over or long-pressed.

subMembers.name: isValid
subMembers.description: Specifies a visual indicator for validation.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies the caption displayed next to the step.

properties.name: dxStepper
properties.description: A Stepper is a UI component that displays progress as a user moves through a sequence of steps.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function that fires when the component finishes its initialization.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when an item (step) is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when an item (step) is right-clicked or long-pressed.

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after an item (step) is rendered.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when an item (step) is selected or the selection is canceled.

Events.name: onSelectionChanging
Events.description: A function that is called before selection changes.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The argument type in the [disposing] event.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The argument type in the [initialized] event.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The argument type in the [itemClick] event.

Types.name: ItemContextMenuEvent
Types.description: The argument type in the [itemContextMenu] event.

Types.name: ItemRenderedEvent
Types.description: The argument type in the [itemRendered] event.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The argument type in the [optionChanged] event.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The argument type in the [selectionChanged] event.

Types.name: SelectionChangingEvent
Types.description: The argument type in the [selectionChanging] event.
